thought: To solve this task I need to craft a hay_block. A hay_block requires placing 9 wheat in a 3x3 grid in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the wheat from slot 27 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1
